item.title: Language Models are Symbolic Learners in Arithmetic
item.description: LLMs don’t calculate; they’re symbolic pattern-matchers in arithmetic, mastering easy patterns first, then tackling harder ones through subgroup selection, as shown by a novel experimental framework.

item.title: Steering Knowledge Selection Behaviours in LLMs via SAE-Based Representation Engineering
item.description: SPARE, a training-free method, uses sparse autoencoders to precisely steer LLMs’ knowledge selection, resolving conflicts between memory and context for improved accuracy.
